sentences.simplifiedText: 即使我们所有的计划都失败了，我们也必须有能力承受失败的影响。
sentences.traditionalText: 即使我們所有的計劃都失敗了，我們也必須有能力承受失敗的影響。
sentences.pinyin: jíshǐ wǒmen suǒyǒu de jìhuà dōu shībài le, wǒmen yě bìxū yǒu nénglì chéngshòu shībài de yǐngxiǎng.
sentences.translation: Even if all our plans fail, we must have the ability to bear the impact of failure.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我将从他们那里承受房子。
sentences.traditionalText: 我將從他們那裡承受房子。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jiāng cóng tāmen nàlǐ chéngshòu fángzi.
sentences.translation: I will inherit the house from them.

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管他的老板不赞同，但他还是愿意承受因坚持自己观点而可能带来的压力。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管他的老闆不贊同，但他還是願意承受因堅持自己觀點而可能帶來的壓力。
sentences.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn tā de lǎobǎn bù zàntóng, dàn tā háishì yuànyì chéngshòu yīn jiānchí zìjǐ guāndiǎn ér kěnéng dài lái de yālì.
sentences.translation: Despite his boss's disagreement, he is still willing to bear the pressure that may come from holding his views.
